alert.note: Alert for Eastern Las Animas County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 8:30PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Baca and southeastern Las Animas Counties through 915 PM MDT... At 829 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles southwest of Kim, or 31 miles northeast of Des Moines, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Kim. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Las Animas County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County
